avis de recherche m (plural avis de recherche)

  1. wanted notice; all-points bulletin (broadcast issued from a law enforcement agency, typically containing information about a wanted suspect or a person of interest)
  2. wanted poster (printed public announcement that the authorities want to apprehend a person for a crime)
  3. missing person appeal
  4. missing person poster

title: avis de recherche
